definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: concubine (Targum [[לְחֵינְתָא]]; Fl:Levy NHWB ii. 534 f. cp. Ar. laxna0, indelicate epithet for woman; Batten:Ezr 2:65 cp. Ar. lah.nun note, tune, song; still otherwise Wetzst:De, HL u. Koh. 454);—pl. sf. [[לְחֵנׇתָךְ]] Da 5:23, [[הֵּ֠]] v:Da 5:2; v:Da 5:3.
